Title: Eagles to release Alshon Jeffery after four seasons as Philadelphia continues to overhaul offense, per report
Description: The Eagles are on the brink of a new era in the franchise's history. As they continue to gear up for this retooling, they are moving on from some former key pieces to the previous regime. The latest is wide receiver Alshon Jeffery,
Author: CBSSports.com on MSN.com
